axis_supply.supply_status: Critical fuel shortage by August 1942. Alam Halfa offensive planned around fuel constraints - only 3 days fuel for sustained combat. Von Vaerst ordered withdrawal 1 September when fuel ran short. Mediterranean interdiction cutting 60% of Axis supplies.

allied_supply.supply_status: Adequate for defensive operations, building up reserves for offensive. Newly arrived from UK, still acclimatizing to desert conditions. Supply lines from Alexandria (240km) secure but division building forward dumps.
